params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.include_objects
params.description: MySQL objects to retrieve from the source.

params.name: data.exclude_objects
params.description: MySQL objects to exclude from the stream.

params.name: data.max_concurrent_cdc_tasks
params.description: Maximum number of concurrent CDC tasks. The number should be non negative. If not set (or set to 0), the system's default value will be used.
